name: DemiMeramon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has a non-red card in its digivolution cards, it gets +1000 DP.

name: Bebydomon
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has 2 or more Digimon in play, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Pickmons
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If this Digimon has [Xros Heart] in its traits, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Bosamon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an effect suspends a Digimon, this Digimon gets +1000 DP for the turn.

name: Monimon
digivolveEffect: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [Twilight] in its traits, it gets +1000 DP.

name: Tokomon
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] When this card is trashed from digivolution cards by an effect, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Shoutmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 0 from Lv.2 w/[Xros Heart] in traits
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card and 1 Tamer card―both with [Xros Heart] in their traits―among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Shoutmon] in its name, it gains ＜Rush＞. (This Digimon may attack the turn it was played.)

name: Shoutmon X4
digiXros: ＜DigiXros -2: [Shoutmon] x [Ballistamon] x [Dorulumon] x [Starmons]＞ When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
effect:
＜Material Save 2＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may place 2 cards in this Digimon's DigiXros requirements from this Digimon's digivolution cards under 1 of your Tamers.)
[On Play] ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)
[End of Attack] By placing all digivolution cards from under this Digimon under 1 of your Tamers, unsuspend 1 of your Tamers, and delete this Digimon.

name: Canoweissmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 3 from Lv.4 w/[Gammamon] in name
effect:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Tamers becomes suspended, this Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, if this Digimon has 12000 DP or more, it gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
[All Turns] This Digimon gains all effects of cards with [Gammamon] in their names in this Digimon's digivolution cards.
digivolveEffect: [All Turns] This Digimon gains all effects of cards with [Gammamon] in their names in this Digimon's digivolution cards.

name: Shoutmon X4B
digiXros: ＜DigiXros -2: [Shoutmon X4] x [Beelzemon]＞ When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
effect:
＜Armor Purge＞
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may place 1 Digimon card with [Xros Heart] in its traits from your hand or from under one of your Tamers under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card. Then, if [Beelzemon] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, return 2 cards with [Xros Heart] in their traits from your trash to your hand.

name: PileVolcamon
effect:
[When Digivolving] ＜Blitz＞ (If your opponent has 1 or more memory, this Digimon may attack.)
[Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP.

name: Shoutmon X5B
digiXros: ＜DigiXros -2: [Shoutmon X5] x [Beelzemon]＞ When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
effect:
＜Blocker＞ ＜Armor Purge＞
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may place 1 Digimon card with [Xros Heart] in its traits from your hand or from under one of your Tamers under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card. Then, if [Beelzemon] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card with [Xros Heart] in its traits from your trash without paying its play cost.

name: Greymon
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 2 cards with [Blue Flare] in their traits among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. If you have a [Kiriha Aonuma] in play, you may return 1 [MetalGreymon] from your trash to your hand instead.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Blue Flare] in its traits and your opponent has 2 or more Digimon in play, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Deckerdramon
effect:
[On Play] ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.) Then, for each Digimon your opponent has in play, ＜Draw 1＞.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [All Turns] While your opponent has 2 or more Digimon in play, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.

name: MailBirdramon
effect:
[On Play] If you have a [Kiriha Aonuma] in play, you may return 1 [MetalGreymon] from your trash to your hand. If you don't have a [Kiriha Aonuma] in play, you may play 1 [Kiriha Aonuma] from your hand without paying its play cost.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Blue Flare] in its traits and your opponent has 2 or more Digimon in play, 1 of your opponent's Digimon can't attack or block until the end of your opponent's turn.

name: Thetismon
effect:
[When Digivolving] If you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 8 or more cards in your hand, by trashing 2 cards in your hand, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: DeckerGreymon
digiXros: ＜DigiXros -2: [MetalGreymon] x [Deckerdramon]＞ When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
effect:
＜Armor Purge＞
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may place 1 Digimon card with [Blue Flare] in its traits from your hand or from under one of your Tamers under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card. Then, if [Deckerdramon] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon can't attack or block until the end of your opponent's turn.

name: Cannondramon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)
[When Digivolving] Unsuspend this Digimon.
[Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Renamon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Option card with [Plug-In] in its traits and 1 yellow Tamer among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you use an Option card with a memory cost of 2 or more, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP for the turn.

name: Sanzomon
effect: [When Digivolving] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains ＜Security Attack -1＞ until the end of your opponent's turn. (This Digimon checks 1 fewer security cards.)
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains ＜Security Attack -1＞ until the end of your opponent's turn. (This Digimon checks 1 fewer security cards.)

name: Taomon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may use 1 Option card with [Plug-In] in its name from your hand without meeting its color requirements and without paying its cost.

name: Achillesmon
effect:
[When Digivolving] If you have 2 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 3 or more security cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -5000 DP for the turn. If you have 3 or fewer security cards, gain 2 memory.

name: Angoramon
effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you play a green Tamer, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon becomes suspended, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Palmon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Vegetation] or [Plant] in one of its traits, and 1 card with [Fairy] in its traits among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Ajatarmon
effect: [Main] [Once Per Turn] By suspending 1 of your green Digimon, you may play 1 Digimon card with [Vegetation], [Plant], or [Fairy] in one of its traits and 3000 DP or less from your hand without paying its play cost.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon becomes suspended by an effect, gain 1 memory.

name: Lamortmon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, unsuspend it.
[When Attacking] If you don't have a Tamer in play, lose 2 memory.

name: Lotosmon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. It doesn't unsuspend during your opponent's next unsuspend phase.
[Opponent's Turn] All of your other Digimon with [Vegetation], [Plant], or [Fairy] in one of their traits gain "[On Deletion] Gain 2 memory, and return 1 Digimon card with 3000 DP or less from your trash to your hand."

name: Spadamon
effect: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your Digimon with [Legend-Arms] or [Xros Heart] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash 1 card from the top of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Stop trashing when you would trash a level 3 card or the Digimon's last card.)
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Legend-Arms] or [Xros Heart] in its traits among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Sparrowmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 0 from Lv.2 w/[Xros Heart] in traits
effect:
[All Turns] While you have another Digimon or Tamer with [Xros Heart] or [Twilight] in its traits in play, this Digimon gets +3000 DP.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] While this Digimon has [Shoutmon] or [Mervamon] in its name, it gains ＜Reboot＞. (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)

name: DarkKnightmon
digiXros: ＜DigiXros -2: [SkullKnightmon] x [DeadlyAxemon]＞ When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
effect:
[On Play] ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon, then, if DigiXrosing with 2 cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 5 or less.
[All Turns] When this Digimon would be deleted, by returning 1 black level 4 or lower Digimon card from this Digimon's digivolution cards to its owner's hand, you may play 1 [SkullKnightmon] or [DeadlyAxemon] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying its memory cost.

name: Justimon: Critical Arm
effect:
[When Digivolving] By returning 1 non-[Justimon: Critical Arm] card with [Justimon] in its name from this Digimon's digivolution cards to its owner's hand, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 9 or less.
[When Attacking] If you have a Tamer in play, you may digivolve this Digimon into a non-[Justimon: Critical Arm] Digimon card with [Justimon] in its name in your hand for 2 memory, ignoring its digivolution requirements.

name: Blastmon
effect:
＜Rush＞ (This Digimon may attack the turn it was played.)
[On Play] If this Digimon has 3 digivolution cards, ＜Blitz＞. (If your opponent has 1 or more memory, this Digimon may attack.)
[Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, by choosing and trashing 1 of this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.

name: ChuuChuumon
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with [Bagra Army] in its traits and 1 [Yuu Amano] among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] When this card is trashed from digivolution cards by an effect, gain 1 memory.

name: Damemon
effect:
[On Play] [When Digivolving] If you don't have a [Yuu Amano] in play, you may play 1 [Yuu Amano] from your hand without paying its play cost.
[On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] When this digivolution card is trashed by an effect, gain 1 memory.

name: GulusGammamon
effect:
[All Turns] While a card with [Gammamon] in its name is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, this Digimon gains ＜Retaliation＞. (When this Digimon is deleted in battle, delete the Digimon it battled.)
[On Deletion] You may play 1 [Gammamon] from your trash suspended without paying its play cost.

name: SkullBaluchimon
effect:
When this card is trashed from your hand by one of your effects, if it's your turn, you may digivolve 1 of your Digimon into 1 purple Digimon card with [Undead] or [Dark Animal] in its traits from your trash for its digivolution cost.
[When Digivolving] If digivolving from the trash, this Digimon gains "[On Deletion] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon." until the end of your opponent's turn.

name: Beelzemon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 3 from Lv.5 w/[Xros Heart] in traits
effect: [On Play] [When Digivolving] You may trash 3 cards from the top of your deck. Then, for every 10 cards in your trash, delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.
digivolveEffect: [End of Attack] [Once Per Turn] For every 10 cards in your trash, gain 1 memory.

name: Sistermon Ciel
effect:
[On Play] If it's your turn, you may digivolve 1 of your Digimon into a Digimon card with [Royal Knight] in its traits from your hand for its digivolution cost.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you digivolve one of your Digimon into a Digimon with [Huckmon] in its name or [Royal Knight] in its traits, gain 1 memory.

name: Taiki Kudo
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Xros Heart] in its traits among them to your hand, and place 1 Digimon card with [Xros Heart] in its traits among them under this Tamer. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Your Turn] When you would play 1 Digimon with DigiXros requirements, by suspending this Tamer, you may place cards from under your Tamers as digivolution cards for a DigiXros.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Kiriha Aonuma
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.
[Your Turn] When you would play 1 Digimon with DigiXros requirements, by suspending this Tamer, you may place cards from under your Tamers as digivolution cards for a DigiXros.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Akari Hinomoto
effect:
[On Play] You may play 1 [Dorulumon] from your hand or from under one of your Tamers without paying its memory cost.
[Your Turn] When you play a Digimon with [Xros Heart] in its traits, by suspending this Tamer, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Zenjiro Tsurugi
effect:
[On Play] You may play 1 [Ballistamon] from your hand or from under one of your Tamers without paying its memory cost.
[Your Turn] When you play a Digimon with [Xros Heart] in its traits, by suspending this Tamer, gain 1 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Ruli Tsukiyono
effect:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.
[Your Turn] When you attack with a Digimon that has [Angoramon] in its name or is level 5 or higher, by suspending this Tamer, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Nene Amano
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Knightmon] or [DeadlyAxemon] in its name or [Twilight] in its traits among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Opponent's Turn] All of your Digimon with [DarkKnightmon] in their names or [Twilight] in their traits gain ＜Blocker＞.
[On Deletion] Gain 2 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Yuu Amano
effect:
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a purple card is placed under this Tamer, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck), and gain 1 memory.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you would play a level 4 or higher Digimon card with [Bagra Army] in its traits, by placing up to 3 purple Digimon cards from under your Tamers in the played Digimon card's digivolution cards, reduce the play cost of that Digimon by 2 for each card placed.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Breaclaw
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, by placing 1 Digimon card with [Gammamon] in its name from your hand under 1 of your Digimon as its bottom digivolution card, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
securityEffect: [Security] You may play 1 [Gammamon] from your hand or trash without payings its memory cost.

name: Hero of the Skies!
effect:
[Main] Activate 1 of the effects below. If you have a Digimon with [Shoutmon X5] in its name in play, activate all of the effects below instead.
・1 of your Digimon with [Xros Heart] in its traits gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn.
・＜Draw 2＞ (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Blazing Memory Boost!
effect:
[Main] Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. You may add 2 cards with [Blue Flare] in their traits among them to your hand, and play 1 [Kiriha Aonuma] among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞ (By trashing this card in your battle area, activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)
・Gain 2 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.

name: Lónkhē Adistakto
effect:
While you have a [Pulsemon] or a Digimon with [Pulsemon] in its digivolution cards in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] If you have 3 or more security cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -12000 DP for the turn. If you have 3 or fewer security cards, place 1 of your opponent's Digimon face down on top of their security stack.

name: Gran del Sol
effect:
When you would use this card, if you have 2 or more suspended green Digimon in play, reduce the cost by 2.
[Main] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon to the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Immortal Ruler
effect:
While you have a [Nene Amano] in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Trash the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, you may play 1 [DarkKnightmon] from your trash for its play cost. If you play a Digimon card with DigiXros requirements by this effect, you may also place cards from your trash in digivolution cards for a DigiXros.
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Justice Kick
effect:
When you would use this card, reduce its cost by 1 for each Tamer you have in play.
[Main] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Justimon] in its name from your hand without paying its play cost. If you do, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost less than or equal to the Digimon you played.
securityEffect: [Security] You may play 1 black Tamer card from your hand without paying its play cost. Then, add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Death the Cannon
effect:
When this card is trashed from your deck, return it to your hand.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 6 or lower Digimon. If there are 10 or more cards in your trash, add 1 to the maximum level of the Digimon you can delete with this effect.

name: Upgrade Plug-In O
effect:
While you have a Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP until the end of your opponent's turn.
securityEffect: [Security] Gain 1 memory and add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Seiken Meppa
effect:
While you have a Digimon with [Royal Knight] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Unsuspend 1 of your Digimon. Then, if that Digimon is [Jesmon GX], activate 1 of its [When Digivolving] effects.
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
